text_block_list.text:
Soon after our first training session 
Seiun Sky's debut race arrived.

Uhyaa, the Twinkle Series is finally about to begin! 
Everyone's getting all excited, it might just make me train hard.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
choice_data_list: Jokes aside, we've got to prepare.

text_block_list.text:
Wahaha. Trainer-san, have you 
finally gotten used to how I roll?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
But you've got a point. Even when fishing, setting the right trap 
is crucial. But first… we should take a walk!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Yup. Just sitting around with our heads in our hands muttering 
ideas doesn't mean we'll have any good ones. So instead, let's 
bask in the sunlight under the beautiful blue sky.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Plus… sometimes you hear some 
juicy information when you're out.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
And so, Seiun Sky and I 
took a stroll around the campus.

Hey, King-chan, look over there!! That's the race bulletin for 
my upcoming race… it even shows what running styles the other 
racers are going to use!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Could it be, are they using new-age technology to predict the 
future? The city really is advanced…!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
No, you're mistaken. That's simply a prediction based 
on the races that those Uma Musume were previously in.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text: Really!? I-I had no idea…!!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
A racing bulletin, huh? Guess they'll put me down 
as a "frontrunner" considering my past races, huh?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer-san… you look like you've come 
up with something. Think up something amazing?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
You want me to run mock races everyday!? And with the racers 
from my debut race!? Not only that, you also want me to run as a 
"stalker" instead of a "frontrunner!?"
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Now hold on! I can't even make it 
to training on time, let alone all of this!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
choice_data_list: If anyone can do it, it's you.
If anyone can do it, it's you.

text_block_list.text:
What did you just say!? What did you just say!? What did you just 
say!? What did you just say!? What did you just say!?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
This is cruel! This is the height of tyranny!! I 
won't be able to properly race like this! I'll lose 
motivation before the race even finishes!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Oh…? Hmm, you've got a 
trick up your sleeve don't you?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Welp, guess I've got no choice! 
I'll do it!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
In return… make sure that we 
achieve great things, Trainer-san.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Seiun Sky spent the next few days doing mock 
races against the competitors from her debut race…

Haa… Haa… Sky-san, that was unexpected. 
So are you planning on running as a "stalker" from now on?
text_block_list.name: ライバルウマ娘

text_block_list.text:
Well I thought it'd be great to do so. After all, 
it looks super cool to come from behind in the 
final stretch and steal the victory!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I guess so… But you weren't able to overtake us. 
Did you run out of stamina?
text_block_list.name: ライバルウマ娘

text_block_list.text:
You're right. And that's the problem. 
I'm really lacking when it comes to stamina… Hehe.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: This rumor began to pick up steam.

"Seiun Sky will be racing as a stalker." 
"Her lack of stamina is her biggest weakness."

On the racing bulletin her running style was changed to 
"stalker." And soon the day of her debut race had arrived!
(Konk!)

The debut race for the up and coming Uma Musume has finally 
begun! The one leading the pack is…
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Uoooooh!!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
S-Seiun Sky! It's Seiun Sky! She's racing forward 
with terrifying speed!! She's created a huge gap 
between her and second place…!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Seiun Sky is running as a "frontrunner!?" Wasn't she supposed to 
be running as a "stalker!?" Don't tell me, did she freak out 
from being on the main stage and rush forward in a panic…?
text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
She's misjudging and acting reckless… very like a freshly minted 
Uma Musume. We should ignore Sky. It seems that's what the other 
runners are thinking as well.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Moreover, Sky's weakness is her lack of stamina… 
There's no way she could make it across the finish line.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text: Is what I want them to think.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I've been secretly training and training so 
that I could get that aggressive start down pat.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
And then… before I know it, 
I'm back in my normal frontrunner's pace.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
The racers are rounding the third corner! 
Yet Seiun Sky is still leading the pack!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Ehh!?
text_block_list.name: Trainers

text_block_list.text: Haha, I can hear the groans all the way from here!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Is winning all about the body you were given? The talent you 
possess? Maybe even your bloodline? Nope, that stuff's boring.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I don't have any of that, 
and that's what makes racing so much fun!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa, haa… 
You all fell for our trap!! Haaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Seiun Sky's lead has yet to fall going into the final straight! 
She's unexpectedly running away with this race! This is going to 
be a huge upset! She's five horse lengths ahead, and she's won!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Wowie, Trainer-san did you hear? 
The groans and shouts from the crowd! It felt so amazing ♪
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
This is what racing was meant to be… 
Trainer-san, you really get it!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Now then, what should our next trap be? 
If we keep this up, maybe you and I really can win it all…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: I will not permit you to do that!!
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Ohh!? King and Spe-chan… 
Eh, you came to watch?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Yup! Congratulations on first place, Sei-chan!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
I knew you were great, Sei-chan… 
But I won't lose to you!!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
I agree! After all, your next opponent will be me, an elite Uma 
Musume! I shall grant you the right to challenge me in a race, 
as well as the right to fail miserably in your challenge!!
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text: Hmm… That's going to be really tough.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
That being said, the bigger 
the fish, the bigger the reward.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Isn't that right, Trainer-san?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
And just like that, Seiun Sky began our quest of 
catching the biggest fish in this theoretical ocean 
known as the world of Uma Musume…
